solution_line_template: Knowing Kevin's record of eating 70 wings in {kevin_time_minutes} minutes or {kevin_total_wings} / {kevin_time_minutes} = <<{kevin_total_wings}/{kevin_time_minutes}={kevin_wings_per_minute}>>{kevin_wings_per_minute} wings in a minute
Alan must increase his ability to eat {alan_current_rate} wings per minute to {kevin_wings_per_minute} - {alan_current_rate} = {wings_to_equal_record} wings per minute to equal Kevin's world record.
To beat Kevin, Alan must eat {wings_to_equal_record}+{beat_record_extra} = <<{wings_to_equal_record}+{beat_record_extra}={wings_to_beat_record}>>{wings_to_beat_record} hot wings per minute.
